channel.title: [718] Adding The New Emotes
channel.description:
NOTE: IDK if this is wrong section. If it is, then please, can a moderator move this thread?
So, I know, this is very simple.. But some people might need it, if they don't know how to add this. If this already have been released, then please tell me!
What we're adding: [img]http://prntscr.com/pl5w1[/img] We're not adding the "full emote", you have to find the graphics/emotes ids by yourself. I'm not going to release any of the graphics/emotes id's.. yet..
Open EmotesManager.java, and search [code]public static int getId(int slotId, int packetId)[/code]
Under that you might see something like this: [code]if(slotId >= 50 && slotId <= 63)[/code]
Change it to this: (I'm using 121, because there's 121 emotes in a 742 cache!!) [code]if(slotId >= 50 && slotId <= 121)[/code]
Now, search [code]public void unlockEmotesBook() {[/code]
Under that you might find: [code]player.getPackets().sendUnlockIComponentOptionSlots(590, 8, 0, 103, 0, 1);[/code]
Change it to this: [code]player.getPackets().sendUnlockIComponentOptionSlots(590, 8, 0, 121, 0, 1);[/code]
Save the file, and compile your server. You're now ready to add the graphics/emotes (the new emotes that you couldn't add before).

item.title: [718] Adding The New Emotes
item.dc:creator: @SlaveScape SlaveScape
item.description:
@SlaveScape wrote:

Thanks bro! Works fine for me

Read full topic
